channel.title: PhoenixPvP - 562 - Need Staff - Bosses! - Eco! - All Skills! - CrystalKey+Chest!
channel.description:
Welcome to PhoenixPvP 562
Website - [url=http://www.phoenixpvpz.com/]http://www.phoenixpvpz.com/[/url] (Default Page is being developed....) Forums - [url=http://www.phoenixpvpz.com/forum/]http://www.phoenixpvpz.com/forum/[/url] (MyBB Forums! Great! Very Easy to Use! Sections off topic, introductions, news, updates, etc...) Webclient - [url=http://www.phoenixpvpz.com/webclient/webclient.php]http://www.phoenixpvpz.com/webclient/webclient.php[/url] (Issue is being resolved...) Vote - [url=http://www.phoenixpvpz.com/vote/]http://www.phoenixpvpz.com/vote/[/url] (Vote Page & System is being fixed)
Download Desktop Client - [url=http://www.mediafire.com/download/18e310h29qef9h5/PhoenixPvP_Client.rar]http://www.mediafire.com/download/18e310h29qef9h5/PhoenixPvP_Client.rar[/url] "If you come across any errors or issues with the downloadable desktop client please report to Adam on the PhoenixPvP Forums!" - Adam
(Webclient is down to current issues with the webhost....) "Will be up soon! Just use the desktop client!" - Adam
I've spent a long time developing Phoenix, I hosted Phoenix-PKz, Project-Diversity, InsidiousX, X-Realms, DediX-Realms, Stitzel-Scape, etc....
I spent time and money developing the website so I hope you guys like it....
The webclient will be fixed.... I had a problem with networksolutions and they fixed it but I have to re-jarsign the client and reupload the client to the site and the webclient will be available... For now I have the desktop client that you can download and play....
Skills work! Summoning Fletching Woodcutting Firemaking Fishing Herblore Etc.... ( I will re-update this thread with more pictures tomorrow when I get a chance!)
Features: KBD Dragons Tarn Barrows Bork Daggs Rock Crabs Etc.....
Home Location [img]http://i.imgur.com/QUvPWNT.png[/img]
The "null:" I forgot to fix, but it will be changed to the player's username. New Account Login Feature.... ( Cool new account login animation! ) [img]http://i.imgur.com/RUDIKcR.png[/img]
The "null:" I forgot to fix, but it will be changed to the player's username. ( Cool login animation! ) [img]http://i.imgur.com/K8xpmWG.png[/img]
Commands - ::commands [img]http://i.imgur.com/1PlCoRI.png[/img]
Rock Crabs + Resizeable Client! & FullScreen! High Definition works too! [img]http://i.imgur.com/y4i0qho.png[/img]
Join now! We need staff! In Game and Forum Staff! Apply on the forums! (HD LIKE A BOSS!) [img]http://i.imgur.com/HQAt0M2.png[/img]
If you don't like PhoenixPvP or don't think it's interesting all you gotta do is wish me luck. :) Don't hate. lol Join if you'd like! We need Staff! Follow the links at the top of the thread!
Owners are Adam & Jake!
We need GFX Artist, Forum Staff, IG Mods, IG Admins, etc.... People to help make our community a safe playable environment!
I WILL ADD MORE PICTURES DON'T WORRY GUYS!
"JOIN THE FORUMS AND A RANDOM PERSON WHO GETS PICKED BY ONE OF THE OWNERS MAY RECEIVE A GIFT IN GAME!" - Adam

@Jolley wrote:

Welcome to PhoenixPvP 562

Website - http://www.phoenixpvpz.com/ (Default Page is being developed…)
Forums - http://www.phoenixpvpz.com/forum/ (MyBB Forums! Great! Very Easy to Use! Sections off topic, introductions, news, updates, etc…)
Webclient - http://www.phoenixpvpz.com/webclient/webclient.php (Issue is being resolved…)

Download Desktop Client - http://www.mediafire.com/download/18e310h29qef9h5/PhoenixPvP_Client.rar
“If you come across any errors or issues with the downloadable desktop client please report to Adam on the PhoenixPvP Forums!” - Adam

(Webclient is down to current issues with the webhost…) “Will be up soon! Just use the desktop client!” - Adam

I’ve spent a long time developing Phoenix, I hosted Phoenix-PKz, Project-Diversity, InsidiousX, X-Realms, DediX-Realms, Stitzel-Scape, etc…

I spent time and money developing the website so I hope you guys like it…

The webclient will be fixed… I had a problem with networksolutions and they fixed it but I have to re-jarsign the client and reupload the client to the site and the webclient will be available… For now I have the desktop client that you can download and play…

Join if you’d like! We need Staff! Follow the links at the top of the thread!
